page.title: 18KEEP FIT
page.content: For ladies, this is held at the village hall on{Tuesdays,}morning and afternoon. The morning class is from 10.00.to 11.30 and has a creche to enable women with young children to attend. There is coffee and tea available afterwards, which helps the class to become a social outlet for many{young mothers.}In contrast, the afternoon class is for{older ladies} of the 50 upwards age group. Both consist of exercise and dance movement to music of all tempo and rhythms. The ladies join with other members of the {national keep fit association}in rallies, demonstrations and fund raising events at the village hall.
